item.title: Entornos virtuales en Python
item.description: Configuraci√≥n entorno virtual en Python First ensure that you have hugo installed. You need a recent extended version (we recommend version 0.61 or later) of Hugo to do local builds and previews of sites (like this one) that uses this theme. If you install from the release page, make sure to get the extended Hugo version, which supports sass; you may need to scroll down the list of releases to see it.
